_comment: User-facing message templates for game responses

descriptions.two_items: There are a {item1} and a {item2} here.
descriptions.exit_template: There are passages to a {exits} here.

errors.unknown_command: I don't know what you mean.
errors.undefined_action: I don't know how to interpret this '{action}' action.
errors.unknown_item_type: I don't know what a '{arg}' is.
errors.already_in_inventory: The {item} is already in your inventory.
errors.cannot_take_from_inventory: You don't need to take things from your inventory.
